title: Two Major Signs That You Need to Repot

subtasks: Identify a plant with circling roots in the pot
Check if roots are growing out of the bottom holes
Determine it's time to repot the plant
Prepare for new growth by ensuring proper lighting and photosynthesis
Remove the plant from the current pot
Break up the circling roots gently
Place the plant in a larger pot
Fill the pot with fresh soil
Water the plant thoroughly after repotting
